title: Gourmet Chocolate by Lindt for Every Occasion | Lindt USA
snippet: Shop the luxurious exclusive assortment of LINDOR truffles, EXCELLENCE chocolate, and Lindt premium gifts! Customize your own flavors, order a box of your favorite gourmet Lindt chocolates, and see exclusive online deals today! Shop now!

title: Chocolate Pick & Mix | LINDT
snippet: Create your own unique LINDOR Truffle selection with our chocolate Pick & Mix. Shop for chocolate gifts for your loved ones, or indulge for yourself.

title: Shop All Lindt Premium Chocolate
snippet: Choose from the finest Swiss chocolate, expertly crafted by the Lindt Master Chocolatiers since 1845. For a Limited Time, Get Free Shipping* on qualifying orders!

title: LINDOR Truffles - Shop Our Chocolate
snippet: For an irresistible gift for another, or an indulgent escape for yourself, Lindt is the answer. Rich and savory chocolates go into every box. Shop today.
